1: Web UI frontend for your scanner

0: Palword Server for Pals and Extreme Prejudice
1: Smurf's Palworld. Come in, have a tako!

0:
- job_name: unraid
  scheme: http
  scrape_interval: 60s
  static_configs:
    - targets: ['${HOST_OCEANO}.${DOMAIN}:9100']
- job_name: pfsense
  scheme: http
  scrape_interval: 60s
  static_configs:
    - targets: ['${HOST_PFSENSE}.${DOMAIN}:9100']
1:
- job_name: unraid
  scheme: http
  scrape_interval: 60s
  static_configs:
    - targets: ['${HOST_OCEANO}.${DOMAIN}:9100']
- job_name: pfsense
  scheme: http
  scrape_interval: 60s
  static_configs:
    - targets: ['${HOST_PFSENSE}.${DOMAIN}:9100']
- job_name: "TEST-KHC"
  scrape_interval: 60s
  static_configs:
    - targets: ["test-khc-node-exporter:9100"]
  honor_labels: true
  relabel_configs:
    - target_label: "cluster"
      replacement: "TEST-KHC"
- job_name: "TEST-KHC-KUBESTAT"
  scrape_interval: 60s
  static_configs:
    - targets: ["test-kube-state-metrics:8080"]
  honor_labels: true
  relabel_configs:
    - target_label: "cluster"
      replacement: "TEST-KHC"

0:
# renovate: github-release depName=hacs/integration
HACS_VERSION="1.34.0"
mkdir -p /config/custom_components
rm -rf /config/custom_components/hacs
busybox wget -qO- "https://github.com/hacs/integration/releases/download/$${HACS_VERSION}/hacs.zip"  | busybox unzip -d /config/custom_components/hacs -

/hr/bjw-s.github.io-helm-charts-app-temp.doc:
Home Assistant

Home Assistant is a home automation platform that has many integrations. It can be used to control lights, fans, thermostats, cameras, and many other devicesn
